segments.text: How do you celebrate national day in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are parades in many cities and people fly the national flags from almost every public building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of parades are there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The parades are usually military ones , but sometimes there are procession of people carrying flags and singing patriotic songs . What do you do on national day in your country ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We don ’ t have a national day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess it is . Most countries have on , but we don ’ t .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , even though we have parades , most people just use the national day holiday to visit family or go shopping . In the evening , many people watch special TV shows which celebrate national day .
segments.speaker: S2
